The  missiles hit Radistor. He looks at Shockwave and Unitron and puts a ha=
nd on his chest. He doesn't fire back, though.

Radistor: Why are they stil=
l shooting? Is this some conspiracy?...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July =
15, 2001 4:41 AM
  Subject: Shockwave & Unitron


  Shockwave/Unitron:



 =
 "It's that Hot Rod aft!  May I kill him?"

  "No.  Focus on that gestalt."=


  "But it looks like they stopped opening fire."

  "No matter.  We can r=
etreat quickly if need b--" Shockwave was interrupted in 
  his conversatio=
n via comm. with Unitron by Dreadwind.

  "I am Shockwave of the Neo Decept=
icon Empire!" he intoned loudly as he sped 
  off through the air, still in=
 his space fighter mode.  He launched two 
  missiles down at Radistor's (s=
p? been awhile since I've seen that dude) back.

  Unitron gave a disembodi=
ed sigh, launching off two missiles at Radistor's 
  chest, ready to do eva=
sive maneuvers when he was shot at with return fire.

  "Fuzor beings," Sho=
ckwave began an order via comm. with the three new fuzors 
  (Hedge), "conc=
entrate your heaviest weaponsfire on the gestalt.  Damaging him 
  enough t=
o break him apart will give us a strategic advantage."

   

  Your use of =
Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
